show.title: A Vow of Joy and Sorrow
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://links.kukufm.com/VvDmEc
show.description: Emperor Nandhilal is cursed with a deadly Yang poison — a fate that promises death before New Year’s Eve unless he shares intimacy with a mysterious girl marked by a mole on her lower neck. Desperate to survive, slowly fate leads him to Brindha — a humble, kind-hearted nursing student who bears the mark. When Nandhilal proposes marriage, Brindha is stunned and hesitant. Why would a mighty emperor want a girl like her?
show.description_secondary: Emperor Nandhilal is cursed with a deadly Yang poison — a fate that promises death before New Year’s Eve unless he shares intimacy with a mysterious girl marked by a mole on her lower neck. Desperate to survive, slowly fate leads him to Brindha — a humble, kind-hearted nursing student who bears the mark. When Nandhilal proposes marriage, Brindha is stunned and hesitant. Why would a mighty emperor want a girl like her?
